article_title: EPA Showdown Before Supreme Court May Hinge On Two Ambiguous Words

article_metadata.author: Michael Bobelian

og.description: An important involving the EPA's power to limit pollutant emissions by the utility industry revolves around the meaning of a brief statutory passage of a multi-hundred page law: the term "appropriate and necessary."
og.title: EPA Showdown Before Supreme Court May Hinge On Two Ambiguous Words
